transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha kaun ki kuthla hai kaun bol raha hai
Customer: Simran baat kar rahi thi India doctors se
Executive: ha ji
Customer: Yes hello
Executive: ha ji ha ji boliye ji namaste
Customer: Namaste sir sir bataye aap call kar rahe the
Customer: maine to 96969696 phone kiya tha
Executive: ha ji ha ji wo call mere hi pass transfer hua hai na isliye main puch
Executive: rahi thi bataye sir kya problem aa raha hai
Customer: actually main surat kumar sahu mera naam surat kumar sahu india mart se hamara shyam namkin karke ek brand develop hua tha shyam namkin uska kam ho raha tha to uska jo catalog catalog ko abhi tak update nahi kar rahe hain main bar bar phone karke bol raha hun wo immediately kam kar dijiye aur wo catalog itna matlab ghatiya banaye hain jaise customer ka response thik nahi aa raha hai jo dekh rahe hain wo hamara humko thik nahi bol rahe hain wo bole ki hum sab update kar denge badhiya se kara denge is hisab se humne payment kiya to abhi tak uska service humko properly nahi mil raha hai
Executive: ha to matlab abhi aapka jo profile vagera hai aapne profile aapne dekhi website vagera kaise tayar hui hai aapne check kara tha
Customer: ha wo check kiya tha humne bola ki aap haedly mat kijiye hum jo data aapne aapko main wo jo mange aapne usko data provide kiye par uske hisab se kam nahi hua hai jo jahan pe bhi dal ke wo update kar diye hain humne unko mana karne ke baad bhi wo update kar diye hain maine bola ki update karke final karke usko update kiye karo wo bole ki nahi nahi hum kar dete hain hamare upar pressure hai hum update fir aapko properly aap time deke baad me ho sakega par abhi tak wo baat nahi sun rahe update nahi kar rahe hain humne mana karne ke baad bhi wo jabardasti kar diya abhi tak update nahi kar rahe hain thik se jaise jaise website ko karna hai wo usse karna hai to wo
Customer: humko click kar diye to abhi humko thik thak nahi lag raha hai website hum bar bar phone kar rahe hain hamare staff phone kar rahe hain respond nahi kar rahe hain
Executive: acha to aap aisa aapko website ka template vagera change karwana hai na taki aapka profile acha dikhe right
Customer: ha ha ha isliye to update
Executive: okay okay ha website hamara jo website ko wo bole ki hum badhiya se banayenge aise banayenge bole ki hum impress ho gaye humne mana kiye the ki hum nahi nahi karenge aap aap thik hai service nahi de rahe jab jab review ho raha hai wo bahut badhiya baat kar rahe hain wo piche pad rahe hain ek din me 10 bar phone waha se aa rahe hain aur payment hone ke baad phone ek nahi aa raha hai wo responding nahi kar rahe hain kam thik nahi ho raha hai
Customer: hum isi bar india mart me nahi kam karne ke liye bole the par unko jabardasti kiye bole ki iska service bahut badhiya hoga kam badhiya hoga aap tension mat lijiye payment hone ke baad fir respond thik nahi hai phone karne se wo responding nahi kar rahe hain kam thik nahi kar rahe hain aap dekhiye hoga to kaise kam padega madam boliye to trust seal jo bol rahe hain abhi tak hamare pass wo seal bhi nahi aaya courier me aane wala tha wo bole the wo certificate nahi aaya
Executive: certificate bhi nahi aaya trust seal ka
Customer: nahi
Executive: acha sir certificate jo hai ye to main check kar leti hu yaha par ki aaya ki nahi aaya hai agar nikla bhi nahi
Executive: karwa deti hu aapko template change karwana hai
Customer: thik hai hamara jo hamara jo website hai shyam namkin ka hamara farm ka naam hai power iska iska website pura acha hona chahiye aur humko develop karke kam kaise aage badhega hamara business kaise aage badhega usko dhyan dena hai business kuch nahi mil raha hai
Executive: thik hai thik hai website thik hoga to website thik hoga to business thik hoga na website to thik nahi hai business kaise aayega
Customer: thik hai aap aisa kariye aap mere sath ek bar video meet pe connect kar lijiye aap mujhe bataye ki kya kya thik karna hai thik hai to main aapka wo thik karwa deti hu right aap kab free rahenge sir mujhe batao
Customer: thik hai main main dekho hamare jo website ka kam dekh rahe hain raju bhai raju bhai ko main wo khane ke liye gaye hain to aane ke baad main unke sath baat karke wo unke sath aapko jo connected kar dunga mujhe thoda ye matlab computer me knowledge kam hai thik hai to hamare jo aadmi hai wo staff hai wo aapke baat karke update kara denge
Executive: ha ji sir thik hai koi issues nahi hai main aapka website ka template karwa deti hu thik hai aur by list vagera ke liye bhi unko ek bar guide kar dete hain ki kaun kaun si karni hai consume vagera thik hai aur kuch calls vagera
Customer: ha calls vagera
Executive: kya aa rahe the aapke pass calls
Customer: hello kaun se hai
Executive: madam voice thik nahi aaya boliye
Customer: main bol rahi hu sir aapke pass jo calls vagera aa rahe hain right ha ha to ye calls vagera kuch answers nahi hue
Executive: voice vagera ka answer nahi ho raha hai
Executive: hello aapke 13 ha sir
Executive: hello madam main aapke sath wo hamara jo website ka kam dekh raha hai wo main 4 baje 4 baje 10 4 baje 10 15 minute ke time aapke sath judi rahunga to thik rahega
Executive: thik hai 4 baje tak na
Customer: 4 baje 4 baje wo khane ke liye gaye hain khane ke liye aane ke baad wo baithega aur main unke pass baith ke aapke sath baat karunga aapka number main kya naam se check karungi madam
Executive: hello
Executive: hello wo wala number sir sir pe number change kar kar rahi hu thik hai jis number pe jis number pe main call kar raha hu usi number me main call karunga ya koi dusra number aap denge
Executive: sir main aapko whatsapp pe message kar rahi hu us number pe thik hai
Customer: thik hai thik hai ha sir main 4 baje tak connect karti hu na aapko
Executive: okay aapka naam madam
Executive: simran simran thik hai madam thik hai thank you ha ji okay sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog not updated; poor customer response.

- Website design is substandard.

- TrustSeal certificate not received.

- Poor responsiveness after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to change website template.

- Executive offered video meet to discuss issues.

- Executive will guide on buyleads.

- Executive will check on TrustSeal certificate.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect at 4 PM with staff.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- website, catalog, trustseal, buyleads, update
